page.title: 06DOVERDALE CHURCH.
page.content: The congregation varies from about 25 to 150 people. The church has two wardens and its own choir of 7 or 8 people.The choir is for boys and girls. Over{Â£300}has been spent on new robes for the choir.Doverdale church has not had any vandalism mainly because there is a farm down the road which keeps an eye on it, but this is surprising as it is an isolated area and you would think people would take advantage of this. People can only get married if they live in the parish. There are about{7}weddings a year.By law you can be buried in the church land if you die in the parish.There are about {5}funerals a year.The church arranges trips for the people of the church.The church has a service on Sundays at 9.45am and another at 11.30am.
